channel.title: Advertising
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I have obviously been away for a while and I'm not informed on several things, however I do intend on starting an advertising campaign for the server very shortly. So, with that being said, what websites are we currently on? If possible, I'd like the creator of the original advertisements to either edit their advertisement or delete them all together.
The websites I know of that we're on are:
[ul][li]Minestatus.net[/li][li]mcserverstatus.com[/li][/ul]
Also, does anybody know of any good advertising videos for the server, or are they all outdated?

item.title: Advertising
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

[quote=“kickingjamie, post:2, topic:508159”]http://minecraft-server-list.com/server/95072/

http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/1725304-147moparcraftnetnon-whitelist/#entry21390909

Just to add, it’s not really worth posting on those kind of pages without buying a top spot on them.[/quote]

Heh, I guess it’s better to try over not trying. I was looking at the costs of the sponsored servers on minestatus.net (they show the top bids each month) and the price that people pay is ridiculous. We’ll just have to get ourselves known via other methods, and use the status pages as a minor advertisement method.

Read full topic

item.title: Advertising
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

Minecraft Servers

Minecraft Servers - Minecraft Server List

Search and Find the best Minecraft Servers using our multiplayer Minecraft Server List. Vote for Top Minecraft Servers. Survival, Creative or in between.

http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/1725304-147moparcraftnetnon-whitelist/#entry21390909

Just to add, it’s not really worth posting on those kind of pages without buying a top spot on them.

Read full topic
